alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 21 at 3:41AM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas, east central Colorado and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be sure to dress appropriately for the commute to work or school Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
